result.title: Google Fb Microsoft Amazon
result.content:
Hi all!

I am an undergraduate student and searching software engineering internship.

Applied online to companies in the title, but didn't receive any reply.

If anybody will share with experience in how to get an offer from companies in the title, it will be helpful all of us.

UPD: Can someone refer me to companies in the title and others, bonus (if I will join) from company for referral is not superfluous :)
